channel.title: Mingyi Zhang Tech Blog - 996 Dev Life
channel.description: Recent content on Mingyi Zhang Tech Blog - 996 Dev Life

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! This is Mingyi Zhang (张鸣一), a Full-Stack Machine Learning Engineer and Software Engineer @ Qimia GmbH. In this blog, I’m documenting my learning notes and side projects. If you have questions or find errors, please email me: mingyizhang1987 AT gmail.com. A bit of history Before joining Qimia, I was a theoretical physicist working on Loop Quantum Gravity. A list of my research papers can be found in INSPIRE-HEP.
